snippet: Public service work can be a gateway to careers and gives new graduates time to consider options and learn about themselves.
abstract: Eilene Zimmerman Career Couch column contends public service work can be a gateway to a career and can give new graduates time to consider options and learn about themselves.
lead_paragraph: Public service work can be a gateway to careers and gives new graduates time to consider options and learn about themselves.

headline.seo: Volunteering Offers a Way to Explore Career Fields
headline.main: A Gateway to a Career Through Volunteering
headline.print_headline: A Gateway To a Career Through Volunteering
